item.description:
Summer is here at last...and we are celebrating at Angelico's Lake House. Join us at their famous Luau and Pig Roast BBQ Buffet...$10.99. Music and dancing provided by Dave Mac Raggae Band @ the Tiki Bar from 2-8 pm. Come and "pig out" with us, then dance it off!

As an extra bonus, there will be an Over 40's Singles Dance Party upstairs in the party room and deck. Music provided by The Party Boyz from 6 to 12 am. So, dance away...

Remember .... Happy Hour Specials everyday 4-6:00pm, late Night 9-10:00pm, $3.00 Apps-Full portions, and daily drink specials !!!

Oh, BTW, wear something festive and befitting for the luau. Dig out that Hawaiian shirt and let's boogie!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup Sign or the red balloon...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Angelico's Lake House...Pig Roast and Over 40's Mixer...
